sentences.sContent: It had rained for four consecutive days.
Can they win the title for the third consecutive season?
sentences.sCn: 他们能连续第三个赛季赢得冠军称号吗？

phrases.pCn: 连续营业日；连续作业日

remMethod.val: con + secut(跟随) + ive → 一个接一个的 → 连续不断的， 连贯的

trans.tranCn: 连续不断的， 连贯的
trans.tranOther: consecutive numbers or periods of time follow one after the other without any interruptions
